Detailed Description

Affine transformation for 2D spaces.

Definition at line 17 of file CAffineTransformation2d.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual const ITransformation2d* i2d::CAffineTransformation2d::CreateCombinedTransformation ( const ITransformation2d &  transform) const [virtual]

Create new transformation being combination of this transformation and the second one.

Please note, that created object is owned by the caller and the caller must remove them.

Returns:
new transformation object (owned by the caller) or NULL if creatiion was not possible.

Implements i2d::ITransformation2d.

virtual bool i2d::CAffineTransformation2d::GetDistance ( const CVector2d &  origPos1,
const CVector2d &  origPos2,
double &  result,
ExactnessMode  mode = EM_NONE 
) const [virtual]

Compute a shorteness distance in transformed coordinations.

Parameters:
origPos1first position in original coordinates.
origPos2second position in original coordinates.
resultobject where result distance between positions in transformed coordinates will be stored.
modecontrols needed transformation exactness.
Returns:
true, if calculation done correctly.

Implements i2d::ITransformation2d.
